TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many authentication attempts. Firebase has temporarily blocked requests from this device/network. Please wait 15-30 minutes or try from a different network. This often happens during development/testing.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS_DETAIL: Firebase has temporarily blocked authentication from this device/network.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS_CAUSE:
üìã Possible Causes:
‚Ä¢ Too many login attempts in short time
‚Ä¢ Multiple app restarts during development
‚Ä¢ Shared network with other testers

‚è±Ô∏è Solution: Wait 15-30 minutes or switch to a different network.
SMS_QUOTA_DETAIL: The daily SMS quota for phone authentication has been reached.
SMS_QUOTA_CAUSE:
üìã Possible Causes:
‚Ä¢ Firebase billing limits reached
‚Ä¢ Free tier SMS quota exhausted
‚Ä¢ Too many SMS sent today
‚Ä¢ Payment method issue

üí° Check your Firebase Console ‚Üí Authentication ‚Üí Usage for details.
CAPTCHA_FAILED_DETAIL: The security verification (reCAPTCHA) could not be completed.
CAPTCHA_FAILED_CAUSE:
üìã Possible Causes:
‚Ä¢ Poor network connection
‚Ä¢ Browser/app blocking scripts
‚Ä¢ Firebase reCAPTCHA configuration issue
‚Ä¢ Ad blocker interference

üí° Try: Disable ad blockers, check network, or restart the app.
AUTH_UNAVAILABLE_DETAIL: Phone authentication is temporarily unavailable. This could be a temporary Firebase service issue.
INTERNAL_ERROR_CAUSE:
üìã Possible Causes:
‚Ä¢ Firebase service temporary outage
‚Ä¢ Configuration issue
‚Ä¢ API key problem

üí° Check Firebase Console for service status.
REGION_NOT_ALLOWED_DETAIL: SMS authentication is not enabled for your region/country in the Firebase Console.
REGION_NOT_ALLOWED_CAUSE:
üìã How to fix:
1. Open Firebase Console
2. Go to Authentication ‚Üí Settings
3. Enable your country in 'SMS Region Policy'
4. Ensure Phone Auth is enabled in Providers
UNAUTHORIZED_DOMAIN_DETAIL: This domain is not authorized for Firebase Authentication.
UNAUTHORIZED_DOMAIN_CAUSE:
üìã How to fix:
1. Open Firebase Console
2. Go to Authentication ‚Üí Settings
3. Add this domain to 'Authorized domains'
